name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry bacon until crispy, then add minced garlic.
Whisk eggs and parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Combine cooked spaghetti with bacon and garlic, then mix in the egg and cheese mixture.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and black pepper.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
steps: Season chicken breast with salt and pepper, then grill until cooked.
Chop mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and cucumber.
Slice grilled chicken and place it on top of the salad.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, then toss gently.

name: Beef Tacos
steps: Cook ground beef in a pan and add taco seasoning.
Chop lettuce and grate cheddar cheese.
Warm taco shells in the oven or microwave.
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Chop broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers into bite-sized pieces.
Heat sesame oil in a wok, then add minced garlic and ginger.
Stir fry vegetables until tender, then add soy sauce.
Serve over cooked rice.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
Cream butter and sugar, then add eggs and vanilla extract.
Combine wet and dry ingredients, then fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out pizza dough and spread tomato sauce evenly.
Top with mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Bake for 10-15 minutes or until crust is golden.

name: Chicken Curry
steps: Sauté chopped onion, garlic, and ginger in a pan.
Add chicken thighs and cook until browned.
Stir in curry powder, turmeric, cumin, and coriander.
Add chopped tomatoes and coconut milk, then simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

name: Pancakes
steps: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl.
Whisk milk and eggs, then combine with dry ingredients.
Heat a pan and melt a small amount of butter.
Pour batter onto the pan and cook until bubbles form, then flip.
Serve with maple syrup.

name: Beef Burger
steps: Form ground beef into patties and season with salt and pepper.
Grill or fry patties until cooked to your liking.
Toast burger buns and assemble with lettuce, tomato, onion, and cheese.
Add ketchup and mustard, then serve.

name: Sushi Rolls
steps: Cook sushi rice and let it cool.
Place a nori sheet on a bamboo mat and spread rice evenly.
Add sliced cucumber, avocado, and crab sticks.
Roll tightly using the bamboo mat, then slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.
